interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Star Trek: The Next Generation: Season 3 [Blu-ray]
Review Date: 2015/05/12
Store: Michael Dorn  (Actor),     Gates McFadden  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, TV
Product Description: ['Season Three of STAR TREK: THE NEXT GENERATION took televised science fiction storytelling to new heights. Now, on high definition Blu-ray, the seminal season of this beloved series is more spectacular and compelling to watch than ever.']
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Science Fiction & Fantasy/Television', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Blu-ray, Box set, Full Screen, Dubbed, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Whoopi Goldberg, Jonathan Frakes, LeVar Burton, Marina Sirtis, Patrick Stewart, Michael Dorn, Brent Spiner, Gates McFadden, Wil WheatonWhoopi Goldberg, Jonathan Frakes, LeVar Burton, Marina Sirtis, Patrick Stewart, Michael Dorn, Brent Spiner, Gates McFadden, Wil Wheaton   See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '6', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': '10655409545', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Blu-ray, Box set, Full Screen, Dubbed, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '19 hours and 41 minutes', 'Release date': 'July 19, 2016', 'Actors': 'Michael Dorn, Gates McFadden, Brent Spiner, Whoopi Goldberg, Jonathan Frakes', 'Dubbed': 'Japanese, Italian, German, French', 'Subtitles': 'Swedish, French, Japanese, Italian, German, Danish, Norwegian, Dutch, Spanish', 'Studio': 'Paramount', 'Number of discs': '6'}
Review Text: It's incredible to see these in HD for the first time.  I have the entire series and going through it in HD was like watching it all again for the first time.  The quality is incredible.  I definitely recommend these and watching the whole series again on Blu Ray!
Review Title: I have the entire series and going through it in HD was like watching it all again for the first time
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

{'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Brian Klein', 'Phil Churchward', 'Nigel Simpkiss', 'Richard Heeley', 'James Bryce', 'Andrew Fettis', 'Owen Trevor', 'Mark McQueen', 'Jon Richards', 'Konrad Begg'], 'Producers': ['Andy Wilman'], 'Starring': ['Jeremy Clarkson', 'Richard Hammond', 'James May'], 'Studio': ['BBC America']} I really enjoy this program. As always, the quality and speed from Amazon is awesome. If you're a top gear fan, this is a must see! This particular episode was hilarious. Great program {'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Dan Scanlon'], 'Producers': ['Kori Rae'], 'Starring': ['Billy Crystal', 'John Goodman', 'Steve Buscemi'], 'Studio': ['Pixar']} It was good, not as good as the first Monsters Inc., movie, but good. The movie is entirely placed when the monsters were in school. The quality is awesome and it's worth watching, but be prepared for an understated plot. I would like to have seen more ties to their work after school and getting hired. This flew by in about a 30 second window in this movie. Not as good as the first one... {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Matthew Vaughn'], 'Producers': ['Stephen Marks', 'Peter Morton', 'David Womark', 'Matthew Vaughn', 'Lorenzo Di Bonaventura', 'Michael Dreyer', 'Neil Gaiman'], 'Starring': ['Claire Danes', 'Charlie Cox', 'Sienna Miller']} I enjoyed the setting and plot of this movie. Of course, in the end, we knew the hero would make it. There were some other surprising plot twists that I hadn't expected. It was an enjoyable find.

If you like movies that contain magic, witches, and some humor, you will probably enjoy this movie. Surprisingly good find.... **Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Preference:** The user continues to enjoy humorous and entertaining programming, particularly animated content and films featuring engaging characters and imaginative storytelling. Their recent positive experience with high-definition re-releases underscores their appreciation for quality visuals.

- **Genre Inclination:** They maintain a keen interest in adventure, fantasy, and science fiction genres, demonstrating a broad thematic interest that aligns well with their preference for captivating narratives infused with humor.

- **Quality Appreciation:** Their high rating for the latest viewing reinforces a consistent expectation for well-produced, high-quality content, as highlighted by their enthusiasm for enhanced visual formats.

- **Rating Trend:** The user has an impressive average rating of 4.8, reflecting a preference for content that effectively balances humor, intriguing fantasy elements, and well-executed storytelling, capable of evoking nostalgia and wonder.

- **Language and Accessibility:** They prefer English-language content with available subtitle options, consistently valuing media that includes diverse language accessibility.

- **Content Advisory Awareness:** The user remains mindful of content advisory labels, showing a preference for responsible media consumption that considers elements like violence and language.

Overall, this user appreciates well-produced, entertaining shows and films that blend humor with thematic elements of adventure and fantasy, while also valuing quality service, production standards, and enhanced viewing experiences.
